title: Grub and Grog Shop
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, British, English, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located within the Northern Monk Refectory (a local brewery bar). 5 minutes from the city centre. Offers mostly vegetarian and vegan food which are marked. Large selection of ales. Uses local suppliers. Breakfast, lunch, sandwiches, stews, gnnochi.
streetAddress: Northern Monk Refectory, Marshalls Mill, Holbeck
